title: Alpha Client
body: I just signed up for the Alpha client 2 days ago. How long should i expect to wait until i get it? Thanks to anyone who answers.

replies.body: it's random so you may not get it till the beta phase I have a friend who has it and signed up roughly the same time
Got accepted 2 days ago, applied about 2 months ago

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EAXK41XU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-16T12:52:34.160+0000)
>
> Got accepted 2 days ago, applied about 2 months ago

Promising...
I've been waiting months to be accepted :(
